## WorkflowInfo type

Represents workflow-related information for items that can participate in a workflow process.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type WorkflowInfo = {
    $type?: string;
    ActivityConstraints?: ActivityConstraints;
    ActivityDefinitionDescription?: string;
    ActivityInstance?: Link;
    ActivityState?: Array<ActivityState>;
    Assignee?: Link;
    AssignmentDate?: string;
    CreationDate?: string;
    DueDate?: string;
    FinishDate?: string;
    Performer?: Link;
    PreviousMessage?: string;
    ProcessInstance?: Link;
    StartDate?: string;
};
```

**References:** [ActivityConstraints](./open-api-client.activityconstraints.md)<!-- -->, [Link](./open-api-client.link.md)<!-- -->, [ActivityState](./open-api-client.activitystate.md)
